method.name: getDownPower2
method.description:
谢blueshell提供函数支持
向下取任意整数的最靠近的2的n次方数

method.name: getUpPower2
method.description:
谢blueshell提供函数支持
向上取任意整数的最靠近的2的n次方数

classRec.name: FormatFrame
classRec.description: 定行列帧资源 格式化
classRec.author: popplecui

method.name: FormatFrame
method.example:
<listing version="3.0">

		     

		     var bd:BitmapData=new BitmapData(1024,128,true,0xffffffff);

			

             var formatFrame:FormatFrame=new FormatFrame(bd,8,4,1,32);

			 var mc:MovieClip=new MovieClip(formatFrame.data,24);

			

			 //todo same as flash.display.MovieClip

           </listing>

method.name: apply
method.description: 设置片段常量寄存器

method.name: getPsCode
method.description: 生成片段着色器汇编码

method.name: getVsCode
method.description: 生成顶点着色器汇编码

method.name: endPsReg
method.description: 该滤镜使用像素着色器后的寄存器索引

method.name: endVsReg
method.description: 该滤镜使用顶点着色器后的寄存器索引

method.name: BrightFilter
method.description: 高亮级别

method.name: level
method.description: 亮度级别

method.name: generateTextureFromBitmap
method.description: Generates a texture from a bitmap. Will use the smallest possible size (2^n)

method.name: generateTextureFromByteArray
method.description: Generates a texture from a bitmap. Will use the smallest possible size (2^n)

method.name: getTextureDimensionsFromBitmap
method.description: Will return a point that contains the width and height of the smallest possible texture size in 2^n
method.return: x = width, y = height of the texture

method.name: getTextureDimensionsFromSize
method.description: Will return a point that contains the width and height of the smallest possible texture size in 2^n
method.return: x = width, y = height of the texture

method.name: TextureData
method.param: useDefault 是否开启缺省材质

method.name: setRegisterPoint
method.description: 置显示对象的注册点,数值范围是 归一化的.例如，注册点设置到中心位置setRegisterPoint(-.5,.5,0)

field.name: visible
field.description: 否显示,注:visible=false的时候是不会提交渲染的.

method.name: addChild
method.description: 加一个显示对象

method.name: sortOn
method.description: 定排序索引，参考Array.sortOn ,默认Z排序

method.name: setTexture
method.description: 显示对象指定一个TextureData。这样才能称它为显示对象.

method.name: addEventListener
method.description: 册handle之后,会在每次渲染之前执行。参照flash中的Event.ENTER_FRAME

method.name: addChildAt
method.description: 加一个显示对象到指定位置

method.name: addChild
method.description: 加一个显示对象

method.name: contains
method.description: 否包含子对象，如果是返回true，否则返回falsh

method.name: getChildAt
method.description: 取指定位置的显示对象

method.name: getChildIndex
method.description: 回子对象的位置

method.name: removeChildAt
method.description: 除一个指定位置的显示对象

method.name: removeChild
method.description: 除一个子对象

method.name: removeChildren
method.description: 除指定范围内的子对象

method.name: setChildIndex
method.description: 置子对象到指定位置

method.name: sortOn
method.description: 照Array.sortOn

method.name: swapChildrenAt
method.description: 换两个位置上的子对象

method.name: swapChildren
method.description: 换两个显示对象的位置

method.name: numChildren
method.description: 回子对象数量
